definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: In the press in the circuit board, the manufacture quantity of the film is a factor of key.
sentences.chinese: 在电路板制印中，底片的制作质量是一个关键的因素。

sentences.english: I want to buy two rolls of thirty-six-exposure Kodakfilm.
sentences.chinese: 我要买两卷底片，另外还要一卷正片。

sentences.english: We should put negative into the camera.
sentences.chinese: 我们得把底片放进照相机里。

sentences.english: He puts the photographic film in the developing solution.
sentences.chinese: 他把底片放到显影液中。

sentences.english: Black & White film is good for portraits.
sentences.chinese: 黑白底片照肖像效果很好。

sentences.english: I couldn't finish developing film until midnight, since I took so many pictures.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了好多卷照片，因此直到半夜才充好底片。

sentences.english: All kinds of things are working when you’re looking at the contact sheet.
sentences.chinese: 当回顾着底片小样的时候，各种情感都会回来的。

sentences.english: It must save you a lot of trouble.
sentences.chinese: 它节省你很多麻烦，用手卷底片是很无聊的。

sentences.english: This paper reports a new method of storing the color-image on the black-white negative film.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种用黑白底片存储彩色图像的新方法。

sentences.english: I'd like 2 prints from each of these negatives.
sentences.chinese: 这些底片我想每张各印两张照片。

sentences.english: The negative must now be printed or enlarged to produce the final photograph.
sentences.chinese: 底片必须被晒印或放大来展示最终的图片。

sentences.english: The large negatives or slides deliver beautifully detailed images with a very nice tonality .
sentences.chinese: 大底片或幻灯片保留了完美的细节，极好的色调。

sentences.english: I still love cutting on film.
I left my bag of film on the ferry .
sentences.chinese: 我把装底片的旅行袋遗忘在渡船上。

sentences.english: The development of photo films requires a dark room.
sentences.chinese: 冲洗照片底片需要暗房。

sentences.english: If you prefer capturing the world on film, take a photography vacation.
sentences.chinese: 如果你偏爱用底片捕捉寰宇风采，就参加摄影假期吧。

definition: film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
